$interpreted: William: ......A human!?
Dylan: William, Your Majesty?
William: He must be one of the soldiers the Lizards captured! Don't worry, I swear on my life I'll bring you home!
William: But you...are human...
Dylan: Your Majesty!
William: He got me, Dylan. My brother and daughter...I can't leave them like this.
Dylan: ...It was just as you had suspected. At first, King William's injury was not that serious. But...
Angelia: ——The Lizard assassin's weapon had poison on it.
Angelia: My Father was victorious in the border wars, but he was unable to escape from the death promised by war...
Dylan: I'm so sorry, Princess Angelia...I mean, Your Majesty. It's my fault. I underestimated the enemy...
Angelia: Those who are gone will never return...I summoned you today for your perspective on the Desert Kingdom's current situation.
Dylan: Your Majesty...please explain.
Angelia: Uncle...Theodore was on the verge of victory in the Civil War. If not for his misgivings about the Desert Kingdom, he would have long defeated us.
Dylan: Yes...Theodore was probably worried about the lack of troops in the capitol, that the Desert Kingdom would've jumped on the opportunity and invaded.
Angelia: The Desert Kingdom and the Kingdom of the Sun have been feuding for generations now. Theodore's calculations make perfect sense.
Angelia: I've not been to the Desert Kingdom. From what I'm told...
Angelia: After Atlas was destroyed, the Desert Kingdom had a monopoly on shipping routes, and has always had abundant natural resources.
Angelia: Most of the citizens of the Desert Kingdom are much richer than our own...
Angelia: Although we won the border war, it was just a superficial victory. In terms of national and military power, the Desert Kingdom is still superior.
Angelia: ...However, ever since I took the throne and returned to the capitol...
Angelia: ...our Kingdom has been rather unstable; a perfect opportunity to make a move. So why haven't they?
Dylan: Your Majesty, do you know how the Desert Kingdom handles royal succession?
Angelia: I recall that they believe "justice is nothing else than the interest of the stronger".
Dylan: Correct. The Lizard Nobles believe the strong prey on the weak. Thus only the strongest have the right to rule the kingdom.
Dylan: Those with a right to the throne battle to the death. The time, place and methods used are irrelevant.
Dylan: The last one standing is the rightful king.
Dylan: After the battle at the border was lost, the old King stepped down, beginning a ten year struggle for the throne.
Dylan: Up until 5 years ago, when the current Queen Diana came out as the victor...
Dylan: Back to your original question...my best guess is that the Desert Kingdom is busy with other matters.
Angelia: Could it be...that our Desert spy has sent news...
Dylan: Indeed...Your Majesty, if I may...

Model.Text: ......A human!?
William, Your Majesty?
He must be one of the soldiers the Lizards captured! Don't worry, I swear on my life I'll bring you home!
But you...are human...
Your Majesty!

...It was just as you had suspected. At first, King William's injury was not that serious. But...

Your Majesty, do you know how the Desert Kingdom handles royal succession?
I recall that they believe "justice is nothing else than the interest of the stronger".
Correct. The Lizard Nobles believe the strong prey on the weak. Thus only the strongest have the right to rule the kingdom.
Those with a right to the throne battle to the death. The time, place and methods used are irrelevant.
The last one standing is the rightful king.
After the battle at the border was lost, the old King stepped down, beginning a ten year struggle for the throne.
Up until 5 years ago, when the current Queen Diana came out as the victor...
Back to your original question...my best guess is that the Desert Kingdom is busy with other matters.
Could it be...that our Desert spy has sent news...
Indeed...Your Majesty, if I may...
